arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connection.

connectedDeviceId.description: The ID of the second device in the connection.

connectedLinkId.description: The ID of the link for the second device.

deviceId.description: The ID of the first device in the connection.

globalNetworkId.description: The ID of the global network.

linkId.description: The ID of the link for the first device.

tags.description: Key-value tags for the connection. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
